S4.T1.caption: Table 1: Statistics of LFM-1b after merging with other datasets.
S4.T1.table:
# listening events 379.754.730
# users 120.053
# artists 26.129
# tracks 282.011
# genres 2.137
references: We base our analysis of recommendations for the music domain on the LFM-1b dataset [20], which we enrich with two further datasets: acoustic features for a selection of tracks (the [20], which we enrich with two further datasets: acoustic features for a selection of tracks (the CultMRS dataset) curated by Zangerle et al. [26], and musical genres annotating a subset of tracks within LFM-1b, kindly provided by Schedl [26], and musical genres annotating a subset of tracks within LFM-1b, kindly provided by Schedl et al. [21]. The acoustic features contained in the dataset were retrieved via the Spotify API [21]. The acoustic features contained in the dataset were retrieved via the Spotify API3 33 33https://developer.spotify.com/documentation/web-api/reference/get-several-audio-features and serve as content-based features describing the nature of a track. Examples for these features are a track’s tempo, or danceability. After merging the three datasets, we are left with 379 million listening events (cf. Table 1).

S4.T2.caption: Table 2: Evaluation of prediction algorithms.
S4.T2.table:
Model MAE
NMF 54.82
BaselineOnly 62.38
KNNWithZScore 65.74
KNNBaseline 67.01
KNNWithMeans 67.47
KNNBasic 71.1
references: Using 5-fold cross-validation, we evaluate each algorithm’s mean absolute error (MAE), and pick NMF as our final model; Table 2 presents MAE for all models.

S4.T3.caption: Table 3: Comparing the top three recommended items obtained from state-of-the-art recommender, against those re-ranked using betweenness centrality applied on a user-profile KG.
S4.T3.table:
Dataset SOTA recommender Re-ranked (betweenness)
Netflix Bakugan: Armored Alliance Creeped Out
The C Word Black Mirror
Weird Wonders of the World Arthur Christmas
LFM-1b Iron Maiden, The Talisman Shakira, Spotlight
Iron Maiden, When the Wild Wind Blows Here We Go Magic, Make Up Your Mind
Shakira, Spotlight Here We Go Magic, Alone But Moving
references: Similarly to LastFM, we observe that betweenness centrality is the metric that most introduces surprise into the list of recommendations obtained from the RS. To further illustrate this finding, Table 3 presents the first three recommendations offered by the RS, compared with those re-ranked through betweenness centrality in particular user-profile KGs. Table 3 illustrates a sample for each dataset.

Similarly to LastFM, we observe that betweenness centrality is the metric that most introduces surprise into the list of recommendations obtained from the RS. To further illustrate this finding, Table 3 presents the first three recommendations offered by the RS, compared with those re-ranked through betweenness centrality in particular user-profile KGs. Table 3 illustrates a sample for each dataset.
